SEARCH
Package mygame.multiplayer.services

Class Monitor<T>

java.lang.Object
mygame.multiplayer.services.PublisherService<T>
mygame.multiplayer.services.Monitor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of argument the callbacks may take
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher<T>, Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
Connection.ConnectionMonitor, DirectoryMonitor, FileMonitor
public abstract class Monitor<T> extends PublisherService<T>
An abstract PublisherService that periodically polls something and calls the callbacks with the result if there is an update. This "something" must be implemented by the poll() method.
See Also:
  • FileMonitor
  • DirectoryMonitor
  • Connection.ConnectionMonitor

  • Constructor Details

    • Monitor

      public Monitor()
      Creates a monitor. The monitor does not start until a callback is added.

  • Method Details

    • poll

      abstract void poll()
      This method is called periodically to check for changes. It should call PublisherService.publish(T) if there is an update.

    • start

      public void start()
      Description copied from interface: Service
      Starts the service.

    • stop

      Description copied from interface: Service
      Stops the service.
